message: I propose dividing the $100 in a 75/25 split. This ensures a fair distribution considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I think 80/20 is a more reasonable split, considering the inflation will hit you harder than me.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 60/40 split. This aims to balance the decreasing value of money while ensuring both of us receive a fair share.
I'm not willing to give up much more, but I'll compromise at 85/15 to ensure we can end this soon.
